quote: you are you when you are true
author: Yasmine Butts

quote: You matter.
author: Suzanne Young,  The Treatment

quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: You are what you share.
author: Charles Leadbeater,  We Think: The Power Of Mass Creativity

quote: You like me not because I like you. I like you just because I like me.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: You are the only you ... You are the best you. You will always be the second best anyone else.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: You become what you think about
author: Napoleon Hill,  Success Through A Positive Mental Attitude

quote: I want to love you without clutching, appreciate you without judging, join you without invading, invite you without demanding, leave you without guilt, criticize you without blaming, and help you without insulting. If I can have the same from you, then we can truly meet and enrich each other.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: I love you. I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had, and no matter what happens to us in the future, everyday we are together is the greatest day of my life. I will always be yours.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quote: You are the love, the lover, and the beloved.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: dear today, i spend all of you pretending i'm okay when i'm not, pretending i'm happy when i'm not, pretending about everything to everyone.
author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still

quote: You are what happiness means to me. And I would rather have today with you than forever with anyone else.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer

quote: Babe!
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: You are what you write.
author: Helvy Tiana Rosa,  Risalah Cinta

quote: Do I love you because you're beautiful, or are you beautiful because I love you?
author: Richard Rodgers,  Rodgers & Hammerstein's Cinderella

quote: You is kind. You is smart. You is important.
author: Kathryn Stockett,  The Help

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I want everyone to meet you. You're my favorite person of all time.
author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park

quote: All I can be is me- whoever that is.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: You are one thing only. You are a Divine Being. An all-powerful Creator. You are a Deity in jeans and a t-shirt, and within you dwells the infinite wisdom of the ages and the sacred creative force of All that is, will be and ever was.
author: Anthon St. Maarten,  Divine Living: The Essential Guide To Your True Destiny

quote: You are more to me than any of them has any idea; you are the atmosphere of beauty through which I see life; you are the incarnation of all lovely things...I think of you day and night. ~ Letter to Lord Alfred 'Bosie' Douglas
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Who are you? No really. Way, way down deep. Who are you?
author: Doug Dillon

quote: To answer your question, you want me because I'm made of awesome.
author: Gena Showalter,  Heart of Darkness

quote: I watch you like a mirror, because I see in you what I see in myself. Who we love is a reflection of who we are.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3

quote: I need you to be happy. I need one of us to be happy.
author: Holly Black,  Red Glove

quote: I love you not only for today and tomorrow but forever.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There's always be a me and you.
author: James Patterson,  Max: A Maximum Ride Novel

quote: My attitude to you will always be the same no matter if you love me or hate me.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
author: Dr. Seuss,  Happy Birthday to You!

quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
author: Pietro Aretino

quote: What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful.
author: Scott Westerfeld,  Uglies

quote: I want my world to start and end with you.
author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: You don't know me. You know one me, just like I know one you. And you can't know every me, and I can't know every you.
author: David Levithan,  Every You, Every Me

quote: I love you for who you are, not who the world thinks you should be.
author: Libba Bray,  Beauty Queens

quote: You are -- your life, and nothing else.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre,  No Exit

quote: You are what your creators and experiences have made you, like every other being in this universe. Accept that and be done; I tire of your whining.
author: N.K. Jemisin,  The Hundred Thousand Kingdoms

quote: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: All good that we do is just for you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You know that I know you know, but I want you to know that I know you know I know you know I know. It’s important for you to know that, you know?
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.

quote: You are like nobody since I love you.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: I always watch you. You consume my every thought.
author: M.A. Stacie,  Unwritten Rules

quote: You are my life now.
author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight

quote: I want you any way I can get you. Not because you’re beautiful or clever or kind or adorable, although devil knows you’re all those things. I want you because there’s no one else like you, and I don’t ever want to start a day without seeing you.
author: Lisa Kleypas,  Tempt Me at Twilight

quote: O God O God I love you.I worship you, I need you.Everything I am is because of you.Everything.O God I hate you.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: You might not understand, but I gave you the best of me, and after you left, nothing was ever the same.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Best of Me

quote: Whether your pleasing or pissing everybody off, your doing something wrong.
author: David Cook

quote: Whose little boy are you?
author: James Baldwin,  The Fire Next Time
